translations.english: Xiang Yu asked: "Where is Pei Gong?"

translations.chinese: 曰：「聞將軍有意督過之，脫身去，間至軍，故使臣獻璧。」
translations.english: Zhang Liang said: "He heard that the general intended to punish him for his faults. He slipped away and secretly returned to his army. Therefore he sent me to present this jade disk."
He also presented a jade goblet to Fan Zeng.

translations.chinese: 增怒，撞其斗，起曰：「吾屬今為沛公虜矣！」
translations.english: Fan Zeng was angry and smashed his goblet. He rose and said: "We and our clans will soon be Pei Gong's captives!"
